lines.text: Alarum: excursions. Enter NORFOLK and forces fighting; to him CATESBY

lines.speaker: catesby
lines.text: Rescue, my Lord of Norfolk, rescue, rescue! The king enacts more wonders than a man, Daring an opposite to every danger: His horse is slain, and all on foot he fights, Seeking for Richmond in the throat of death. Rescue, fair lord, or else the day is lost!

lines.speaker: king richard the third
lines.text: A horse! a horse! my kingdom for a horse!

lines.speaker: catesby
lines.text: Withdraw, my lord; I'll help you to a horse.

lines.speaker: king richard the third
lines.text: Slave, I have set my life upon a cast, And I will stand the hazard of the die: I think there be six Richmonds in the field; Five have I slain to-day instead of him. A horse! a horse! my kingdom for a horse!
